Reviews.Title: Motherboard quit, but Dell fixed it. Running well now.
Reviews.Author: Thinker
Reviews.Content: Seriously. Not a month of use, and the motherboard is dead. It can't identify a boot device. Been on chat with a (friendly, thank goodness) Dell rep who is sending a tech to replace the motherboard. I hope this is a one-time problem. My previous Dells have fared far better...UPDATE: A couple of months have passed since the comment above and I'm less frustrated with this computer. Dell actually did the right thing and sent a tech to look at and fix the laptop. He replaced the motherboard and everything is working okay now. The tech met me at work and fixed the computer before the end of my day, so it was very convenient. Well done Dell, I'm pleasantly surprised. Now I just hope the computer keeps working (it's great when it does...)

Reviews.Title: would not boot after just a few weeks, returned to Amazon
Reviews.Author: PaulC
Reviews.Content: This laptop looked good out at first. It is definitely not a high end product, but then one would not expect this at this price. Things got bad after just a few weeks though as it would no longer boot. I tried to resolve the issue with Dell technical support, but this took so long to do that I returned the product for a replacement as suggested by Amazon. Great service from Amazon, and poor show from Dell. I am told the issue is due to an incompatibility issue between the Windows 8 updates (which the machine downloads automatically once switched on) and the hardware. I am ordering a second laptop like this one an hope to have more luck with it next time.Update: despite having been sourced from a different supplier, the second laptop failed after just a few days and would not boot. Exactly the same problem as with the first laptop. I tried to resolve the issue with Dell technical support, but this proved to be really frustrating. The technical centre is based in India and the telephone line kept dropping. I had to call 5 times, which was really infuriating because I had to start from scratch each time (warranty code, laptop model, my name, description of the problem, etc). Very disappointingly, Dell could not fix the problem over the phone, and  wanted the product returned to them for servicing - this would have taken weeks. It was much easier and quicker to return the laptop to Amazon for a refund. Not impressed at all by Dell, I think there are better choices. Do not buy this product.I have heard of others complaining about the technical support from Dell. It is obvious the staff in the technical support centre are not technical at all, they are just people working to a script. I think they are doing the best job they can, but the support they can offer is limited, and the script makes the whole process very time consuming and cumbersome, especially if like me you had to call back 5 times because the call dropped. I spent over 1 hour on the phone dealing with the first laptop, and well over 2 hours dealing with the second one. Might have been OK if they had offered a resolution, but they did not, so I had to return both laptops anyway.

Reviews.Title: Wish that it would work
Reviews.Author: jamesdevins
Reviews.Content: Pros: price, seem very well built, keyboard, size/convience. When it was working, it was fast and ran very smooth.The Issues: After about 4 weeks it would not boot. I sent it off to Dell service center and they needed to replace the motherboard, hard drive, audio board and reinstall Windows 8. Not sure what the exact issue was and Dell support has been somewhat vague. When the laptop was returned an administrator profile was setup and it would not allow me to create a profile. I was on the phone with tech support for over an hour for them to tell me the OS needs reset/put back on the computer properly (not sure why this was not fixed properly before sending back to me). Anyway they want me to buy an external disk drive and install Windows 8 again.Overall I'm very pleased with the build of the laptop and wish that it would work.UPDATE: I sent the laptop back and was given a refund. I do not recommend buying this laptop because of the 4 weeks issues (will not boot). I have found several other reviews stating the same issues as mine. It appears Dell's quality has lowered. I was also not pleased with the customer support.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: 47lucia
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing, I wish I had read the other reviews warning of this product.  I purchased it and 2 months later it wouldn't recognize any of the components - no wireless, no pointing device.  I got on the phone with Dell technical support for over 1 1/2 hours.  They said the hard drive failed and would send out a technician with a new hard drive to install.  Two days later that happened.After installing the hard drive, the technician said to wait for the computer to reboot and install the programs.  24 hours later, it said it was still installing the programs on the screen.Called Dell again and was on the phone again for another hour with them having me run all kinds of diagnostic tests.  Clearly they didn't know what the problem was and said they would be sending me something in the mail to install.They ended up sending CD's.  My computer does not have a CD!!  They should have checked the computer configuration to determine if I had a CD or not.  That wasted another 3 days.Got on the phone AGAIN with technical support - for over 1 1/2 hours.  Still more testing, more questions.  They said they would be sending out something else to me.  Anticipating it would take another 2 days to receive, I asked to be transferred to their supervisor.  Another 35 minutes and she couldn't do anything.  I asked for a replacement and she said she couldn't authorize it.I said I didn't want to do any more testing, diagnosing, installation of things.... I need the issue resolved and nobody can tell me what is wrong.  She said she would send this to an escalation team who would get back to me in up to 48 hours.Seriously - I just can't believe the computer failed after 2 months and I can't get the thing fixed. It sounds like a lot of other people had the same problem so just be aware when purchasing this product.  I have no idea if it is another hardware piece like the motherboard or something else.  I'll let you know if I find out anything else.

Reviews.Title: The best value for money
Reviews.Author: Amir
Reviews.Content: I went through many reviews to finally choose this one, it's the best you can get at this price. I've been using it now for more than a month and am so satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Defective dell?
Reviews.Author: Dipchand Bahall
Reviews.Content: The laptop worked for one hour and had to be returned. I am very hesitant about looking at a dell again. It was a bad experience, maybe I was one Of the unlucky persons to get a defective laptop.

Reviews.Title: Came with blank screen
Reviews.Author: Paraguayo-Tekorei
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a new item and when i got it it came a blank screen, and the seller didn't want to answer about this malfunction, the repair cost 250 dollars and now is finally working. Also i don't like the covers of the usb ports, they are so annoying; it can't be opened on a flat surface, you got to lift the laptop a little bit to oper the covers.

Reviews.Title: Bad hard drive
Reviews.Author: LMT
Reviews.Content: Hard drive was bad on arrival. It is currently packed up and ready to be shipped back to Amazon. I am not even going to request a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Not reliable ....
Reviews.Author: Anne Jones
Reviews.Content: I have had this computer less than 3 months and it has completely crashed. Dell will not help me because I did not pay for their extended warranty, which is $199.  I just figured a laptop should last longer than 3 months.Update: the third Dell person I spoke with finally acknowledged the existing warranty. So it will be repaired, but what a headache this has been! Cant say I am too anxious to buy another Dell any time soon....

Reviews.Title: my laptop,
Reviews.Author: James Williams
Reviews.Content: Its only used for searching the internet or reading the gmail. Its very fast and effichent. The only fault is it gets very Hot in your lap,  I wish there a way to cool it off.

Reviews.Title: broken after one month
Reviews.Author: wh
Reviews.Content: this computer is thin and pretty.However,the quality is not good.It cannot be booted after one month since I bought it.

Reviews.Title: wireless not working properly
Reviews.Author: Raul Herrera
Reviews.Content: I did not recommend this computer specially if you take online courses, the wireless fails at any time. I hate it

Reviews.Title: A very good slim notebook from Dell
Reviews.Author: John Kwok
Reviews.Content: I acquired recently one of the earliest Dell Inspiron 13zs and had to ship it to Dell for servicing. Much to my amazement, their customer service and technical support was absolutely first rate, correcting a flaw in the battery and conducting extensive tests to ensure that this laptop performed as good as new; I am also grateful to them for giving me a year's warranty on this laptop despite the fact that I had purchased it second-hand from Amazon's Warehouse Outlet. As for the unit itself, I am especially impressed with how quickly it loads web pages, due no doubt to having 6 MB of RAM. Despite its relatively slow 1.4 Ghz speed, it has performed nearly as fast as an older Dell XPS M1330 which I still use daily; that older Dell has a 2.2 Ghz speed. This is almost the perfect laptop for web searching. My only reservation is that it seems to be less durable in construction than the Dell XPS M1330 or some other Dell laptops that I still use. Those thinking of getting the Dell Inspiron 13z at its currently faster Ghz speeds will find this a very good notebook equal in quality to similar ones from HP and Apple.

Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Dell 13z is amazing for this price. It's fast, quiet and light weight(portable).The keyboard layout is perfect for me. This laptop runs Windows 8 flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Damaged product
Reviews.Author: Deli hernandez
Reviews.Content: The product is damaged, the motherboard is damaged! don't have guarantee at the dell store... I lost the product! Are irresponsible! Supposed to be a new product

Reviews.Title: LCD screen dead after 10 months
Reviews.Author: Alex Recto III
Reviews.Content: LCD screen dead after 10 months. Good thing my warranty is still valid. Look for a better brand like HP or Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Nice Sleek Laptop
Reviews.Author: Abel Nsidibe
Reviews.Content: This personal computer is so sleek and the performance is good too.The sceen size also make the system more sleek, nice design from Dell

Reviews.Title: One of the worst laptop
Reviews.Author: Kei
Reviews.Content: I have never seen any bad laptop until my laptop would not boot after 3 or 4 months. Some people have same problem!!!  I don't recommend to buy this laptop. Dell should have responsibility their customer. Please don't make junk.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Duane L.
Reviews.Content: I like the size and performance of the computer.  I like typing on the keyboard.  The touchpad is integrated into the palmrest so there aren't any cracks to collect dirt and crumbs.I installed an SSD in mine.  Be aware, that as this is in the "ultrabook" category, you need a 7mm thick hard drive, where as standard 2.5" drives are 9.5mm thick or so.  I also installed Windows 7 and it works great.  Dell offers drivers on their website.  The label on the bottom identifies this as an Inspiron 5323.The port covers are annoying.  I'd rather have functionality over aesthetics.  They open just far enough to connect my mouse, but it would just be better if they weren't there, but that is the worst thing I have to say about the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: exactly what i espected.. great performance.. the only thing is the RAM memory bus it's of 800mhz and one of these is fujitsu and the other it's samsung.. good size and weight.. The Dell's laptops never disappoint me..

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: jubeibob
Reviews.Content: I've had her for a while now and I have fallen in love with 13 inch laptops. It's bigger than a netbook, but still fits in my purse!I'm a light gamer and have had zero problems. World Of Warcraft runs very well. Other low end games like Terraria and Minecraft work great, etc. Windows 8 wasn't a problem to learn quickly and it's really not a deal breaker as some people say. I had heard some people complain about the resolution of your screen and resizing windows and all of that, but that's not been a problem for me either. Browsers and photo editing software and everything works without complication. The processor speed and ram really make it a good machine.Very glad I got this and for the price I was exceptionally happy! I spent several days trying to decide between several machines at $500 and less and went with this one. Glad I did.

Reviews.Title: I like this one
Reviews.Author: LYU "SARACH"
Reviews.Content: Until now, I like this one.It is cheap and light. Even though it is not as powerful as the ones with i-5 system. but it is enough for me.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Matías Guerrero
Reviews.Content: It is a good quality product. It meet all my expectations because it has no technical problems and it is what i want

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron i13z-8864sLV
Reviews.Author: Raul Soto "soto3sa"
Reviews.Content: I was worried at first because I read some bad reviews about this machine but so far, the laptop has worked just fine. I only had one issue with the operating system (Windows 8) but since the upgrade to 8.1 it has worked flawlessly. One thing that bothers me is the fact the all ports a hidden by this plastic lids that I don't think are going to last many years. Besides, it makes connecting usb equipment a pain in the neck since one has to hold the lids with one hand while inserting the connector with the other. This usually means one has to put the laptop on its side to make the process less cumbersome. The screen doesn't give very accurate colors and before the windows upgrade it would flick a bit when the brightness was lower. It doesn't happen anymore.  Apart from that is an excellent machine. It's fast and starts up really quick.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron i13z-8864sLV 13-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: jlmarte33
Reviews.Content: Suddenly the battery stopped holding a charge. That had happened to me with other laptops and I knew that possibly removing it and putting it back again would fix the problem. Well it did too in this case, but I had to remove cover, keyboard and some other components before I could reach the battery and actually disconnect / reconnect it, always afraid of breaking something. Awful design for end user. Also the access to usb, hdmi, card reader, ethernet is a real pain.

Reviews.Title: Just in time delivery. It was great!!!
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: I got the laptop just in time for my daughter. She loves her new laptop!!!I would recommend this laptop to anyone. This is my 2nd purchase of this laptop. The first was for my son.My both children are at university and find this laptop to be useful for their purpose.Great service, timely delivery, great product!!! Who can ask for more...

Reviews.Title: Product is Very Good
Reviews.Author: Mahesh Krishnan
Reviews.Content: I bought this product in the month of Mar 2013, It's been a almost a year, I love this Laptop. Everything works fine. 6 gig of ram is powerful enough. But I don't like the windows 8 so I replaced it with UBUNTU. I am lovin it.AMAZON STORE CARD - PROBLEM.1. DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON STORE CARD, Really having a bad experience by purchasing this laptop from amazon card.2. They said they will convert the whole price into monthly equal installment, But they have not done it and when I call them they simply ask me to pay the bill or min payment, Which I declined saying that I don't want to pay the min payment but monthly installment, They didn't bother and increased the interest and late fee etc., They are bunch of liars and they ruined by credit score for <400 $. I already paid $280 but I still owe them $480 because of late charges etc., Therefore I am suggesting not to buy from amazon store card because they are bunch of liars and do not help you fix the actual problem which was to convert the payment to equal monthly installment.Really having a very bad experience with AMAZON STORE CARD PAYMENT - GECRBDO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON STORE CARD...

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Art "Wise Owl"
Reviews.Content: Great little laptop. Highly functional, yet simple. Hate the new Microsoft programming, but that is not a reflection on the computer itself.

Reviews.Title: a decent laptop for reasonable price
Reviews.Author: O
Reviews.Content: it is the best what u can buy with a 400 $ ( i all ready checked)i had to change the motherboard after 1 month  but i didn't have to pay a penny ( thanks to dell maintenance they are the best)

Reviews.Title: A great laptop with very minor issues
Reviews.Author: Paul in Oregon
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific little laptop. Note that it does NOT include a CD/DVD drive but that's because if the small form factor. I simply went down to my local tech shop and bought an external DVD-R drive. To be honest I bought this unit after working for a couple months with a Samsung Chromebook. I love the Chromebooks and I love the idea of cloud computing, but there were a handful of tasks that I needed to have a full-fledged Windows PC to complete. My original thought was to blow off Windows 8 as soon as this laptop arrived and to load Windows 7. But it came at the same time as the Windows 8.1 update so I decided to give it a try. Since that time I have found a way to COMPLETELY eliminate the Windows Metro interface from ever coming up, and for all intents and purposes this OS now works almost identical to Win7. The Inspiron 5323 is a decent little laptop and I love the size. Sure it could be a bit snappier, but I didn't get it for heavy lifting...just basic business applications and some photo, audio and video editing. I've owned it for about 3 weeks now and everything seems to be working great. If I had one complaint it would be the incredibly frustrating covers on the side ports. I connect USB devices regularly and you need three hands to basically plug something in. (I wasn't made with three hands...thus my frustration.) My goal for this unit is to eventually buy a flash memory hard drive and probably upgrade the RAM to 8 GBs.

Reviews.Title: worth money
Reviews.Author: Vimal
Reviews.Content: i have bought it for my wife and just because of windows 8, it is very slow that i knew. i am planning to downgrade it with windows 7

Reviews.Title: affordable
Reviews.Author: leonie ferguson
Reviews.Content: anyone looking for a sleek and affordable laptop that is easy to transport would be interested in this as it works well for me.

Reviews.Title: Light weight and nice looking.  However....
Reviews.Author: J. Li
Reviews.Content: After 2 months, the monitor suddendly gave trouble.  It had a vertical line across, and it flashed rapidly, and lost lots of resolution.  I called Dell.  Since I purchased it from Amzon, Dell couldn't find my info on their system.  They refused to help me on it, and pushed me back to Amazon.  I spent half hour online with amazon rep.  Nicely enough, I got authorization to return it.  However, 100 bucks were gone for shipping and re-stocking.Otherwise, I liked the sleekness of this laptop.  Easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: The usb ports are hard to use.  Is not as fast as I expected. Delivery was great and I am pleased overall with the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Goooood!
Reviews.Author: drazen cvitkovic
Reviews.Content: I recived it on time and it came how it was written.It came in a good condition.This laptop or netbook is a realy usefull and good equiped.Not expensive and that is just a laptop what I want!I'm recommanding to buy from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Fit and fast but I have trouble with wifi
Reviews.Author: PpO0205
Reviews.Content: I like it this laptop beacuse is very fast and slim but just need a DVD writing and could be perfect.I have trouble with the wifi every time.

Reviews.Title: My new laptop
Reviews.Author: Omar Salem
Reviews.Content: This laptop is amazing I fully recommending it, fast like I want it and light  and the windows 8 is even more awesome.

Reviews.Title: OS stopped working 3 months later
Reviews.Author: Jorge Elizondo
Reviews.Content: I called Dell support and after 47 mins on the phone and transferred to 5 different people to be told to call another nombre to get a simple DVD to restore my computer.just don't buy it...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Anil Kumar Chitrala
Reviews.Content: Good laptop seem to be performanceless costno cd writer in itgood good good good good good good

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: The Cuber
Reviews.Content: Note: I have the i3-3227u with 4gb of ram, very similar product but not exactThis laptop exceeded my expectations, it is very fast, sleek, light, and just amazing. It is perfect for surfing the web, checking emails, and light gaming such as Garry's Mod, Minecraft, Terraria, and other light games. On high settings I get an average of 40-50 frames per second in Minecraft. On lowest settings, I get anywhere from 150-210 frames, To get this insane frame rate, I put this lapton on max performance and put the Intel Hd graphics settings on performance instead of quality. I am writing this review on this laptop and the keyboard is amazing, a little bit of flex with pressure but other than that this laptop is perfect for work and play, I would rate this laptop 10/5 if I could. Great job Dell, you really made a perfect PC.
